mapper.insert: INSERT INTO syl_user_bound_tab (recordNo, userAccount, userSylAccount, chainAddress, chainAddressName, shengyuanCoin, tranRatio, handleMark, addTime) VALUES (#{recordNo}, #{userAccount}, #{userSylAccount}, #{chainAddress}, #{chainAddressName}, #{shengyuanCoin}, #{tranRatio}, #{handleMark}, #{addTime})
